article_title: Carly Fiorina in Rock Hill: ‘I’ve been tested’
article_text:
02:16

Black pastors rally in support of HB2, saying LGBT rights are not civil rights

article_metadata.news-keywords: Carly Fiorina, Winthrop University, 2016 election, president, republican, candidates
article_metadata.description: A fiery Carly Fiorina brought her outsider campaign to Rock Hill Wednesday night, blasting what she called “the professional political class,” including fellow Republicans on Capitol Hill.
article_metadata.title: Carly Fiorina in Rock Hill: ‘I’ve been tested’ | The Charlotte Observer
